sources.Name: Chihaya
sources.Description: Chihaya is an open source BitTorrent tracker written in Go. A customizable, multi-protocol BitTorrent Tracker.

sources.Name: Evil-Trinity
sources.Description: Evil-Trinity source is based from unfinished and unreleased U-232 v6 code.

sources.Name: FreeTSP
sources.Description: FreeTSP (FreeTorrentSourceProject) is a PHP BitTorrent tracker based on TBDev.

sources.Name: Gazelle
sources.Description: Gazelle is a web framework geared towards private BitTorrent trackers. Although naturally focusing on music, it can be modified for most needs. Gazelle is written in PHP, JavaScript, and MySQL.

sources.Name: Luminance
sources.Description: Luminance is an attempt to structurally improve and clean up the Gazelle program code.

sources.Name: meanTorrent
sources.Description: meanTorrent is A Private BitTorrent Tracker CMS with Multilingual support and a full-stack JavaScript open-source solution, which provides a solid starting point for MongoDB, Node.js, Express, and AngularJS based applications.

sources.Name: NyaaV2
sources.Description: Complete Torrent Tracker written in Python.

sources.Name: NyaaPantsu
sources.Description: Complete Torrent Tracker. An alternative to NyaaV2 written in GoLang.

sources.Name: Oppaitime-Gazelle
sources.Description: Oppaitime-Gazelle is written in PHP and is a fork off Gazelle.

sources.Name: Orpheus-Gazelle
sources.Description: Orpheus-Gazelle is written in PHP and is a fork off Gazelle.

sources.Name: Pu-239
sources.Description: A rewrite of the popular torrent tracker U-232.

sources.Name: Radiance
sources.Description: Based off Ocelot, Radiance tracker supports IPv6 and some other extras that Ocelot lacks. Written in C++.

sources.Name: RidPT
sources.Description: Private Torrent framework Project. Built on MixPHP and Zui.

sources.Name: UNIT3D
sources.Description: Complete Private Torrent Tracker built on the PHP Laravel Framework and VueJS.

sources.Name: XBT
sources.Description: High-Performance BitTorrent Tracker written in C++.

sources.Name: XBTIT Blu-Edition by BluCrew
sources.Description: PHP Torrent Tracker Script built off the original XBTIT.
